params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.table
params.description: Required. The table to update. The table's name field is used to identify the table to update.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. The list of fields to update. A mask specifying which fields (e.g. deletion_protection) in the table field should be updated. This mask is relative to the table field, not to the request message. The wildcard () path is currently not supported. Currently UpdateTable is only supported for the following field: deletion_protection If column_families is set in update_mask, it will return an UNIMPLEMENTED error.

methods.name: getTable

The table's name field is used to identify the table to update.

params.name: var

The table's name field is used to identify the table to update.

methods.name: getUpdateMask
methods.description:
Required. The list of fields to update.

A mask specifying which fields (e.g. deletion_protection) in the table field should be updated. This mask is relative to the table field, not to the request message. The wildcard (*) path is currently not supported. Currently UpdateTable is only supported for the following field:

  • deletion_protection If column_families is set in update_mask, it will return an UNIMPLEMENTED error.
